data.name: Fishing Paradiso Demo
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese, French

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2G Hz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra
  • Processor: 2G Hz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal or OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2G Hz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
